title: AI Tutoring Platform
description: Building an adaptive learning platform that uses large language models to provide personalized tutoring experiences for K-12 students.

title: Interactive Documentary Series
description: Produced and directed a multi-part interactive documentary exploring the intersection of technology and storytelling in West Africa.

title: Curriculum Engine
description: Designed an open-source engine that generates standards-aligned lesson plans using structured data and generative AI.

title: Community Radio App
description: Built a mobile-first web application for community radio stations to stream, archive, and share programming with local audiences.
